title: Alliance of 6 Nations
description: The Alliance of 6 Nations is a recent strategic alliance of the nations on the [Elathian](/geo/continents/elathia) continent who oppose the expansionistic tendencies of the [Malinval](/geo/nations/malinval) Orcs, as well as the worship of [Nera](/ref/gods/nera), [Mat'raktha](/ref/gods/matraktha), and [Malik](/ref/gods/malik). Made up of [Curinor](/geo/nations/curinor), [Eldoran](/geo/nations/eldoran), [Demal Thor](/geo/nations/demalthor), [Kandor](/geo/nations/kandor), [Gerasalim](/geo/nations/gerasalim), and [Dormania](/geo/nations/dormania), the alliance was impossible until recently because of recurring wars between the elves and dwarves over the [Mithril Hills](/geo/features/mithrilhills). The crowning achievement of the Alliance has been the construction, maintenance, and manning of the [Fortress of Light](/geo/landmarks/fortressoflight) and other border forts along the [Blighted Gap](/geo/features/blightedgap).
